alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 7:11PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cheshire and west central Hillsborough Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 711 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sullivan, or 10 miles northeast of Keene, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Antrim, Hancock, Nelson, Sullivan, Windsor, Gilsum, Marlow, Hillsborough and Alstead. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
